All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Represents a single playing card used in the game.
CardTest
Unit tests for the Card class.
Deck
Represents a standard shuffled deck of 52 playing cards.
EliminatedPlayerException
Exception thrown when an operation is attempted on a player who has already been eliminated from the game.
EmptyDeckException
Exception thrown when an operation is performed on a deck that currently contains no cards.
Game
Main game controller that manages turns, players, the deck, and the table state.
GameController
Main controller for the game view.
GameView
GameView class This class builds and manages the main game window for "Cincuentazo".
HumanPlayer
Represents a human-controlled player in the game.
IDeck
Defines the basic operations supported by a deck of cards.
IGame
Defines the contract for a Cincuentazo game logic implementation.
IGameController
Defines the contract for controllers that manage a Cincuentazo game view.
IPlayer
Defines the contract for any player participating in the game.
IStartController
Defines the contract for the start (menu) screen controller.
MachinePlayer
Represents a non-human (CPU-controlled) player that plays automatically.
Main
Entry point of the "Cincuentazo" JavaFX application.
Player
Abstract base class providing common behavior for all players.
StartController
Controller for the start (menu) screen.
StartView
StartView class This class represents the initial screen of the "Cincuentazo" game.
Table
Represents the state of the table during a game.
TableMonitorThread
Background thread that periodically refreshes the game table view.
TurnMonitorThread
Background thread that observes the current turn and notifies the UI layer.
